item.title: Overhanging foliage causing danger through narrowing the road, 7th July
item.description:
As you turn down Ullenwood Manor Road, the trees at Star College are growing in to the road. This is forcing traffic into the centre of a narrow and congested rat run road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Manor Lane, Coberley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We reported this on fix my street in 2024. Nicki Kelly said ticket issued to dig down as collapsed drain suspected. We have received no update since. Has issue been investigated. What was the outcome. We should be able to email Highways for updates, but are directed to report on Fix My Street., 7th July
item.description:
Bottom of Sunset Lane, junction with Olld Toad, Southam
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunset Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in pavement problem, 7th July
item.description:
Customer reports that a large vehicle has mounted the pavement at the location and left a wheel-shaped groove in the tarmac, around 75cm long and 7cm deep. They are concerned that it is a trip hazard for pedestrians.
Report on FixMyStreet
